caption.p: Map of the study area in Hubei Province and the occurrences and locations of subpopulations of Rhinopithecus roxellana (DLT, JHL, and QJP refer to the Dalongtan, Jinhoulin, and Qianjiaping subpopulations, respectively). The population in Hubei Province was found in the Shennongjia (SNJ) National Park, Shennongjia Forestry District, and Badong Natural Reserve
